titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Abstract of ownership of 181 Dean Street, Brooklyn, NY 1997.081
titlestmt.author: John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:17:15 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Abstract of ownership of 181 Dean Street, Brooklyn, NY
did.abstract: The document is officially titled "Abstract of the Title of John Goetz" and concerns the property located at 181 Dean St., Brooklyn, NY. Dated 1891, it contains a summary of property transactions dating back to 1766.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Abstract is in the public domain.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Abstract of ownership of 181 Dean Street, Brooklyn, NY, 1997.081, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated to the Brooklyn Historical Society by Mauro Zulli in 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The document is officially titled "Abstract of the Title of John Goetz" and concerns the property located at 181 Dean St., Brooklyn, NY. Dated 1891, it contains a summary of property transactions dating back to 1766.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The Brooklyn Land Conveyances, circa 1699-1896, may contain additional property ownership information.
